CustomField.description: Select the Household Account if a Program Engagement benefits members of the Contact's Household Account. For example, meals from a food bank. If it benefits only one Contact, leave blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the Household Account if a Program Engagement benefits members of the Contact's Household Account. For example, meals from a food bank. If it benefits only one Contact, leave blank.
CustomField.label: Household Account
